details.name: Dry Time
details.info:
Touch: 1 hour
Recoat: 2 hours
*Measured at 25°C and 50% relative humidity
*Local climate conditions may affect the required drying time and recoating interval specified above. For best results, follow the normal painting procedures of your standard latex emulsion paint.

details.name: Theoretical Coverage
details.info:
30-35 sq. m. 
*Depending on surface texture and porosity
* per 4-Liters at 1.8-1.6 mils DFT

details.name: Thinning Solvent
details.info: Use as supplied. If necessary, thin with not more than ½ Liter of clean water per 4-Liter can.

details.name: Application
details.info: By brush, roller, or airless spray
